strings.Value: "Bad news, Your Grace: there is a thief within your close circle. A significant shortage has been discovered within the treasure. An investigation is already underway — the guilty party will soon be brought before you for judgment."

"Unpleasant but, alas, expected news: someone with access to the treasury seems to have appropriated a large sum from it. The circle of suspects is not particularly wide — I believe we will soon discover who was responsible."
"I'm sure it's unthinkable to you, but someone from your court has sticky fingers! A large sum has vanished from the treasury. I've already started looking for the responsible party."

"I... Umm... I think I might know something about this, um, sad — no, shocking! — most shocking event. Can we discuss it one-on-one, maybe? I'll wait for you at the inn after council!" {n}Without waiting for your reply, Linzi runs out of the throne room.{/n}
{n}Kassil stares after the bard, surprised.{/n} "I'd have never imagined she would find herself connected to such a crime..."
{n}Shandra silently raises an eyebrow, but she refrains from commenting.{/n}
"Oh? Perhaps this investigation will be quicker than I thought!"
